geekshop.model

Class GSOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.salespointframework.core.AbstractEntity<org.salespointframework.order.OrderIdentifier>
      • org.salespointframework.order.Order
        • geekshop.model.GSOrder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GSOrder>, org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<org.salespointframework.order.OrderIdentifier>

    @Entity
 @Component
public class GSOrder
extends org.salespointframework.order.Order
implements java.lang.Comparable<GSOrder>
    An extension of Order extended by order number, OrderType and, if this order is a reclaim, the initial order this order is referring to.
    Author:
    Sebastian Döring, Elizaveta Ragozina
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • GSOrder

        @Deprecated
protected GSOrder()
        Deprecated. 

      • GSOrder

        public GSOrder(org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount ua)
        Creates a new GSOrder.

      • GSOrder

        public GSOrder(org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount ua,
               GSOrder reclaimedOrder)
        Creates a new reclaim GSOrder with the given initial order.
        Parameters:
        reclaimedOrder - may be null. If it is, this order's type is set to NORMAL. Else, the reclaimed order must not be a reclaim, but a paid order being not older than 14 days.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given reclaimed order is a reclaim, is open, cancelled or completed.

      • GSOrder

        public GSOrder(org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount ua,
               org.salespointframework.payment.PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
        Creates a new GSOrder with the given PaymentMethod.

      • GSOrder

        public GSOrder(org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount ua,
               org.salespointframework.payment.PaymentMethod paymentMethod,
               GSOrder reclaimedOrder)
        Creates a new reclaim GSOrder with the given PaymentMethod and the initial order.
        Parameters:
        reclaimedOrder - may be null. If it is, this order's type is set to NORMAL. Else, the reclaimed order must not be a reclaim, but a paid order being not older than 14 days.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given reclaimed order is a reclaim, is open, cancelled or completed.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(org.salespointframework.order.OrderLine orderLine)
        Adds an OrderLine to the GSOrder, the OrderStatus must be OPEN.

        If this order is a reclaim and the given OrderLine is a GSOrderLine, the order line's type is also set to reclaim.

        Overrides:
        add in class org.salespointframework.order.Order
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given reclaim order line contains a product which does not exist in the reclaimed order or if the quantity of the given reclaim order line exceeds the quantity in reclaimed order.

      • pay

        public void pay()
        Replaces payOrder of OrderManager.

        Sets the OrderStatus to PAID. If this is a reclaim, the reclaimed products are restored in Inventory. Else, the bought products are taken from Inventory and, if the current amount is falling below the specified minimal amount, a message will be sent to the owner.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if order is not open, payment method is not set or order has no order lines.

      • complete

        public void complete()
        Replaces completeOrder of OrderManager setting OrderStatus to COMPLETED.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if order status is not PAID.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Replaces cancelOrder of OrderManager setting OrderStatus to CANCELLED.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if order status is not OPEN.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Convenience method for checking if an order has the status OPEN.
        Overrides:
        isOpen in class org.salespointframework.order.Order

      • isPaid

        public boolean isPaid()
        Convenience method for checking if an order has the status PAID or COMPLETED.
        Overrides:
        isPaid in class org.salespointframework.order.Order

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Convenience method for checking if an order has the status COMPLETED.

        In addition, if this order is not a reclaim order and 14 days are already expired, the OrderStatus is set to COMPLETED.

        Overrides:
        isCompleted in class org.salespointframework.order.Order

      • isCanceled

        public boolean isCanceled()
        Convenience method for checking if an order has the status CANCELLED.
        Overrides:
        isCanceled in class org.salespointframework.order.Order
